import { Form, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import classes from './AuthForm.module.css' function AuthForm() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true) function switchAuthHandler() { setIsLogin((isCurrentlyLogin) => !isCurrentlyLogin) } return ( <>

{isLogin ? 'Log in' : 'Create a new user'}

{isLogin ? 'Create new user' : 'Login'}
) } export default AuthForm
